Action.author: huikang
Action.body: The link to configtxgen is also broken at order/README.md. It contains a broken link https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/release-1.1/docs/source/configtxgen.rst.

Action.author: rpjday
Action.body: True enough, but I submit that errors in README.md files should be fixed separately since their content doesn't contribute to the *generated* documentation.
